generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
network: Network error. Please check your connection.
server: Server error. Please try again later.
notFound: The requested resource was not found.
unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
forbidden: Access to this resource is forbidden.
validation: Please check your input and try again.
timeout: Request timed out. Please try again.
offline: You are currently offline. Please check your connection.
maintenance: The system is currently under maintenance.
rateLimited: Too many requests. Please wait and try again.
fileUpload: File upload failed. Please try again.
fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is {{maxSize}}.
loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
passwordResetFailed: Password reset failed. Please try again.
sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please login again.
accountLocked: Your account has been locked. Please contact support.
accountNotVerified: Please verify your email address before continuing.
insufficientPermissions: You don't have permission to perform this action.
resourceNotFound: The requested resource could not be found.
paymentFailed: Payment processing failed. Please try again.
paymentDeclined: Your payment was declined. Please check your payment method.
emailSendFailed: Failed to send email. Please try again.
smsFailure: Failed to send SMS. Please try again.
databaseError: Database error occurred. Please try again.
configurationError: System configuration error. Please contact support.
thirdPartyError: Third-party service error. Please try again later.
quotaExceeded: You have exceeded your quota limit.
maintenanceMode: The system is in maintenance mode.
browserNotSupported: Your browser is not supported. Please update or use a different browser.
javascriptDisabled: JavaScript is required for this application to work properly.
cookiesDisabled: Cookies must be enabled for this application to work properly.
storageQuotaExceeded: Storage quota exceeded. Please clear some data.
contactSupport: If this problem persists, please contact our support team.
errorReported: Error has been reported. Thank you!
